meanings.definition: Halakahs - Jewish religious laws or customs
meanings.sent1: Learning about halakahs is important in understanding Jewish traditions.
meanings.sent2: The rabbi taught us the halakahs during the religious class.
meanings.sent3: When the halakahs said not to mix meat and dairy, I accidentally made a cheeseburger!
meanings.sent4: Following the halakahs is like following a map to spiritual fulfillment.
meanings.sent5: The halakahs are like the threads that weave the fabric of Jewish life together.

meanings.definition: Halakahs - Rules or guidelines for behavior in Jewish tradition
meanings.sent1: Children are taught the halakahs from a young age to guide their actions.
meanings.sent2: Respecting elders is one of the important halakahs in Jewish culture.
meanings.sent3: I broke the halakahs of waiting in line when I cut in front of everyone at the store!
meanings.sent4: The halakahs act as the compass that directs us towards moral decisions.
meanings.sent5: The halakahs are like the guardrails that keep us on the path of righteousness.
